document.full_text: europe must take tough decisions before the imf can release its next block of aid for greece, the fund warned on tuesday, while ratings agencies and german banks cast doubt on whether private investors can be expected to help.
document.title: eu must make tough decisions on greek rescue: imf
lines_and_colors: europe must take tough decisions before the imf can release its next block of aid for greece, the fund warned on tuesday, while ratings agencies and german banks cast doubt on whether private investors can be expected to help.
